name: APT28
description: APT28 is attributed to Russia's GRU and has been active since 2004. Known for targeting political entities and conducting cyber operations.

name: APT29
description: APT29, linked to Russia's SVR, has targeted government networks in NATO countries and was involved in the SolarWinds campaign.

name: Sandworm Team
description: Sandworm Team is tied to Russian GRU and responsible for major disruptive operations like NotPetya and the Ukraine power grid attacks.

name: Turla
description: Turla is known for sophisticated espionage targeting government and diplomatic entities worldwide, often linked to Russia's FSB.

name: Evil Corp
description: Evil Corp is a Russian cybercriminal group involved in financial theft and ransomware campaigns.

name: Sandworm
description: Sandworm has conducted major disruptive attacks, including on Ukrainian infrastructure and global ransomware campaigns.

name: Gamaredon Group
description: Gamaredon is a Russian cyber-espionage group that focuses on Ukrainian government and military entities.

name: Zebrocy
description: Zebrocy is a Russian-linked group using custom malware to target governmental and military organizations globally.

name: Armageddon
description: Armageddon is a Russia-linked group targeting critical infrastructure with espionage and disruptive attacks.

name: Berserk Bear
description: Berserk Bear is linked to Russian intelligence and targets critical infrastructure in Europe and North America.
